description: Removes a VPC Interface from an existing flow. This request can be made only on a VPC interface that does not have a Source or Output associated with it. If the VPC interface is referenced by a Source or Output, you must first delete or update the Source or Output to no longer reference the VPC interface.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow that you want to remove a VPC interface from.

parameters.name: VpcInterfaceName
parameters.description: The name of the VPC interface that you want to remove.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that is associated with the VPC interface you removed.

nested_items.name: NonDeletedNetworkInterfaceIds
nested_items.description: IDs of network interfaces associated with the removed VPC interface that MediaConnect was unable to remove.

nested_items.name: VpcInterfaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC interface that was removed.
